short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pre-populate pull requests with a template on Github and Gitlab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin helps you quickly format your pull requests for Github and Gitlab projects.

A unicorn will appear as an icon next to the default text box tools that when pressed will show you the pre-established format.

Current format:
## Description


## Criteria of acceptance
- [ ] a
- [ ] b
- [ ] c

## Testing


## Captures
